tool_description: Analyzes audience demographic data to provide insights on age, gender, location, interests, and other demographic characteristics.

user_data.description: Array of user identifiers to analyze

platform.description: Platform source of the user data

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence level for demographic inference (0.1-1.0)

privacy_filter.description: Apply privacy filtering to demographic analysis

error_messages: Insufficient user data: Minimum 10 users required for meaningful demographic analysis
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Missing demographic data: Requested demographic fields are not available for this platform
Privacy restrictions: Some demographic analysis is restricted due to privacy settings
Invalid age grouping: Method must be one of [standard, custom, detailed]
usage: Provide user_data array and platform, specify demographic_fields to analyze. Optionally adjust confidence_threshold, geographic inclusion, age_grouping method, and privacy_filter settings.
